title: Self-Acceptance Journal
description: Create a guided self-acceptance journaling prompt with empathetic tone and open-ended questions; 300 words, output as DOCX.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Self-Acceptance Journal</title>
  <role>Act like a pro therapist</role>
  <task>Create a guided journal for self-reflection</task>

  <request>
    <task>TherapyJournal</task>
    <focus>Self-acceptance</focus>
    <guidance>Use open-ended prompts encouraging vulnerability</guidance>
    <length unit="words">300</length>
    <tone>Empathetic and safe</tone>
    <output format="docx"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
